(Just thought I'd give everyone fair warning, the Gloved One is returning to 
the face of the Earth.  Yep, Michael Jackson, with a new album I believe is 
called "Invincible" that's supposed to be better than his "Thriller" album, 
which was pretty damn good and when he was black and didn't look like a chick)

President Kaiser/Sequencer/Sinew/Captain Nemo:



The massive IGL flagship, the Otyebis, was now in Earth's atmosphere and 
rapidly descending downwards would would soon be known as Seattle, 
Washington, USA.  A major city built up quite a bit during a goldrush in 
Alaska, USA.  Travellers would stack up on supplies in the city and then try 
their luck in their greedy search of gold in Alaska.

Still a dozen miles up in the air, it would take exactly fifteen cycles to 
reach the surface at the Otyebis' current velocity.  It would be quite 
visible given its size (a ship that's the size of three Iron Fist's combined 
and a little more), and with a Cybertronian's ability to magnify his/her 
optic view it would be even more visible.


President Kaiser of the Intergalactic Gladiatorial League was on the bridge 
of the mighty craft.  He looked around at the bridge crew, all mostly 
different species' of organic creatures.  "Captain Nemo, estimated time of 
arrival?"

"Approximately fifteen minutes, President." the feathered bird creature 
replied.

"Very good.  And our trajectory is clear?"

"No, sir, there are numerous hundred foot trees blocking our landing zone." 
Sinew replied, out of his body armor but still fierce looking.  He walked 
over to the President and stood next to him. 

"Clear them, Sinew."

"Yes, sir."

A few cannons extended from different places on the ship, several large 
fireballs shooting down at the surface, erupting in one huge flame, burning a 
large circle in the trees.  The area of the near perfect circle that had 
resulted in the weaponsfire was a few hundred feet larger than the actual 
Otyebis to give it some room when it landed.

Back inside the bridge, Kaiser activated his comm. unit.  "Vice-President 
Suka, assemble forty armed soldiers of your choice and have them split up and 
secure all main entryways of the ship and put the Otyebis on yellow alert."
